'''''Break the Benighting''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to clear out all seven of the [[Strange Phenomenon: Miasma|miasma-corrupted zones]] in [[Chenyu Vale]].
